I am a professor at [Sorbonne Université](https://www.sorbonne-universite.fr/), in the [Laboratoire de Probabilités, Statistique et Modélisation (LPSM)](https://www.lpsm.paris)

I am specialized in statistics, especially latent variable models, network models and change-point detection, and their applications in life sciences, formerly in genomics and genetics and now mostly in ecology

### R packages

I have been a (very minor) contributor to the following R packages: 

- [PLNmodels](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/PLNmodels/index.html): Poisson Lognormal Models </br>
- [RGMM](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RGMM/index.html): Robust Mixture Model <br>
- [qch](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/qch/index.html): Query Composed Hypotheses </br>
- [CptPointProcess](https://github.com/Elebarbier/CptPointProcess): Change Point Detection for Point Processes
